name: Godot Wild Jam 51 - Cash Cow Climb
name_original: Godot Wild Jam 51 - Cash Cow Climb
description:
A game for the Godot Wild Jam 51

Upgrade to reach the top of the platforms and defeat the Cash Cow.

Use arrows to move. Z to jump. Press down while in the air to drop to the ground damaging enemies on the way. Press down while at your house to open the upgrade menu.

Assets used:

  • Arcade Platformer Assets by GrafxKid https://opengameart.org/content/arcade-platformer-assets
  • Miscellaneous 2D Game Assets (cow sprite) by JeremyWoods https://opengameart.org/content/miscellaneous-2d-game-assets
  • Shining coin Shining Health Shining Power Up Sprite Sheets by bevouliin https://opengameart.org/content/shining-coin-shining-health-shining-power-up-spr...
  • Monogram font by Vinícius Menézio (@vmenezio). https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
